name: AR Image Recognition App
stack: Unity 3D• Vuforia • ARCore • Android • C# • Firebase
summary: Allows users to scan a predefined image and automatically plays a linked video in augmented reality. Used in educational and event settings to deliver interactive explanations by scanning images.

name: Medical AI Chatbot (RAG)
stack: Python • NLP • LLM/RAG • LangChain • Pinecone • API integrations • Flask • Vector Database • GIT
summary: Built a chatbot concept for medical Q&A with retrieval-based responses and evaluation focus.

name: Injury Image Analysis & Segmentation Prototype
stack: Python • Gradio • OpenCV • NumPy • PyTorch • Hugging Face Transformers • PIL (Python Imaging Library)
summary: Built a local Gradio-based prototype that analyzes uploaded injury images by detecting the primary region using DETR panoptic segmentation, extracting bounding boxes with OpenCV, estimating size and area using pixel-to-centimeter conversion, and computing average RGB color values for basic visual analysis.

name: Desktop Support & Incident Management Project
stack: Ticketing Workflows • ServiceNow • Office 365 • Windows/macOS • Active Directory • ITSM
summary: Provided first-level desktop support by logging, triaging, and resolving incidents and service requests, documenting resolutions, tracking progress, supporting device setup, laptop refresh activities, and basic security and access control procedures.

name: ServiceNow Incident & Request Management System
stack: NYC DOE USA • ServiceNow • ITSM • Incident Management • Request Fulfillment • SLA Tracking • Workflow Automation
summary: Configured and supported Incident and Service Request workflows in ServiceNow for the New York City Department of Education, including categorization, prioritization, SLA tracking, and automated task routing to improve resolution efficiency and user experience.

name: ServiceNow Service Catalog & Workflow Automation
stack: Saxo Bank Denmark • ServiceNow • Service Catalog • Flow Designer • UI Policies • Business Rules • Access Control
summary: Developed Service Catalog items with approval workflows using Flow Designer, UI Policies, and Business Rules for Saxo Bank (Denmark), standardizing request handling, enforcing access controls, and reducing manual processing.

name: ServiceNow Reporting & Operational Insights
stack: IBM India • ServiceNow • Reporting • Dashboards • ITSM Metrics • Data Validation
summary: Built ServiceNow reports and dashboards for IBM Pune to track incident trends, request volumes, and SLA compliance, supporting operational visibility, data-driven decisions, and continuous process improvement.

name: Bookstore Database Management System
stack: Oracle SQL • ER Modeling • Triggers • Constraints • SQL Joins • Data Integrity
summary: Designed a relational Bookstore Database using Oracle SQL by applying ER modeling, foreign keys, triggers, and constraints. Built entities such as Books, Authors, Categories, Orders, Users, and Promotions, implemented SQL joins, automated audit logging, and enforced data integrity.
